title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors. These members can not be on the Board of Governors. Its function is to direct the general operations of the bank, notably: ... In accordance with the Board of Governors, establishing policies and making other decisions, loans, investments; ... Submit yearly for approval the audited accounts to the Board of Governors. The EBRD is composed of many members with voting powers, from European and non-European states to the membership of other institutions such as the European Investment Bank, however depending on the geographical location of each member, voting rights differ.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank. The President manages the work of the Bank under the guidance of the Board of Directors. ... The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, the European Union and the European Investment Bank.

title: Former EBRD President Sir Suma Chakrabarti
snippet: Sir Suma Chakrabarti was President of the Bank from 2012-2020.
